RMIClient - Class in polimi.ingsw.networking.rmi
RMIClient Class
Handle all the network communications between RMIClient and RMIServer
From the first connection, to the creation, joining, leaving, grabbing and positioning messages through the network
by the RMI Network Protocol
RMIClient(Flow) - Constructor for class polimi.ingsw.networking.rmi.RMIClient
Create, start and connect a RMI Client to the server
RMIServer - Class in polimi.ingsw.networking.rmi
RMIServer Class
Handle all the incoming network requests that clients can require to create,join,leave or reconnect to a game
by the RMI Network protocol
